turns.text: Task 1: Ordering Coffee at a Café

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can we practice taking order for coffee?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! Let's do it. I’ll be the barista again, and you can be the customer. Whenever you're ready, just let me know what coffee you'd like to order, and we’ll go from there.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, today I, um, can I, could I get three of coffee? One cappuccino, flat white, and the other one is mocha.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! So, that’s one cappuccino, one flat white, and one mocha. Would you like them all in large sizes, or do you have any specific preferences for each?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh yes, I want large for flat white and mocha, and a regular one for cappuccino. And also cappuccino can I change for the milk?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! So that means we’ll have a large flat white, a large mocha, and a regular cappuccino with oat milk. That sounds great! Anything else you'd like to add or any other preferences?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Sorry, excuse me, the cappuccino will add the chocolate powder.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No worries at all! So we’ll have the cappuccino with oat milk and a sprinkle of chocolate powder on top. That sounds delicious! Is there anything else I can do for you?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Let's, oh, can I have it in?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We’ll make it all for here then. I’ll get those ready for you to enjoy at the shop. Anything else you’d like to add or any other questions?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do you have a recommendation for mail?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We have some delicious pastries and sandwiches that pair really well with coffee. For example, our almond croissant or a classic avocado toast is always a hit. Let me know if you’d like to try any of those!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Do you have Australian Big Breakfast?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Yes, definitely! We have a hearty breakfast platter that includes eggs, bacon, toast, and some fresh fruit. It’s a great way to start the day! Would you like to add that to your order as well?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, but sorry, I'm vegan, so can I without bacon?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course, no problem at all! We’ll make sure the breakfast platter is completely bacon-free and just as delicious. Anything else you'd like to customize or add to your order?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “And I also want the element custom to take away.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We’ll add an almond croissant for takeaway as well. That’s a lovely addition. So, to recap, we’ve got the three coffees, the breakfast platter without bacon, and the almond croissant to go. Sounds perfect! Let me know if there's anything else.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Can I have a shared plan for breakfast?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We can definitely do a shared breakfast platter as well. I’ll make sure it’s portioned so that it’s perfect for sharing. Anything else you’d like to add or adjust?

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Oh, I'm so sorry, I already ordered the mocha, right? Can I change for chai latte?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: No problem at all! We’ll switch that mocha to a chai latte for you. That sounds lovely. Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to adjust!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, and I also my chart latte, can I change for the regular one?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Of course! We’ll make that chai latte a regular size instead of large. That’s absolutely fine. If there’s anything else you need, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “My breakfast, big breakfast, can I have a little scrambled egg?”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: Absolutely! We’ll make sure the breakfast platter comes with scrambled eggs instead. That sounds delicious! If there’s anything else you’d like to tweak, just let me know.

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Okay, now I think we need a little tap of water. Thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I’ll make sure to include a top of water as well. Everything sounds great. If you need anything else, just let me know!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “All good, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're very welcome! I'm glad we could sort everything out. If you need anything else in the future, just let me know. Enjoy your coffee and breakfast!

turns.speaker: learner
turns.text: “Yeah, thank you.”

turns.speaker: bot
turns.text: You're so welcome! Have a wonderful time, and feel free to reach out anytime. Take care! ​​
